summary:
A highly detailed longsword using 2048x2048 textures complete with its own scabbard.
One Handed & Two Handed included.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.minus.com/iQ29DY2Ux4mZE.png[/img]

[color=#8f8f8f]
[size=small]


Previous sword in the series - [color=white]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56049/?[/color]
Next sword in the series - [color=white]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57182/?[/color]

[center][youtube]ujJVtypkA5Y[/youtube][/center]
[youtube]fIwyxQYuMpI[/youtube][youtube]7TH4-UXMSbs[/youtube]
[youtube]pKNfASDqqAs[/youtube][youtube]UrJTfZ8-2DM[/youtube]
[youtube]zB2SFMBx_v4[/youtube]
[color=white]-
VENUS[/color]

A highly detailed longsword sword using 2048x2048 textures complete with it's own scabbard.
One Handed and Two Handed included.

[color=white]-
LOCATION[/color]

Both the one handed and two handed can be crafted at any forge under the steel category.

[color=white]-
INSTALLATION[/color]

-Use NMM
or
-Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder
-Make sure the Venus.esp is checked your Launcher

[color=white]-
CHANGE LOG[/color]

1.0 - Initial release

[color=white]-
CREDITS[/color]

Thanks to Bethesda
Thanks to Imsumdave for the environmental map
Thanks to Black Tree Gaming Ltd.
Thanks to Novem99 & ttl269 for the nifskope tips

[color=white]-
PERMISSIONS[/color]

Feel free to upload this mod anywhere and include it wherever you please.
Credit would be appreciated.

[/size][/color]
author: Zikoru
